 About MAIZE Font                                               ttrottxt           w  §@ì	§X¹`                       "Œ  MAIZE (ver. 1.02) copyrighted 1992, all rights reserved.¥ Maize is my version of an old typeface called Bonaire. It's used mainly for display, but not restricted to that purpose. It's great for use in: ads, newsletters, display headlines, or for any desktop publisher who wants that something extra to stand out in their designs. This typeface also includes many of the special characters supported by Apple computers.¥ WHAT'S INCLUDED?IF TYPE ONE FONT:"Maize" -the print driver."Maize.b.map" -the screen font of 24 pt. ( Note: bitmaps are not cleaned up, use Adobe Type Manager for screen display or the True Type version.)"About MAIZE Font "- the text file you're reading now.IF TRUE TYPE FONT:"Maize.suit" -the screen/print driver. (Font file)"About MAIZE Font"- the text file you're reading now.¥ You may upload these files to other bulletin boards provided all files are included without alteration.¥ WHAT'S NOT INCLUDED.No assumption of liability of any kind, for any reason.¥ If you find this typeface useful please send $10.00 to the address below, and receive a user license and more information on other fonts.              Rick W. Mueller             Type Offer W             R.R. 1, Box 108             Elkader, IA  52043-9727Enjoy,Rick,  Dec. '92P.S. We would love to see any of your designs, (newsletters, Brochures, etc.) created using this display face.                        About MAIZE Font    ttrottxt   ttrottxt   @                  §@ì	  w  ÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿ                       ÿÿ
